statements: SELECT * FROM user_activity_logs;
SELECT user_id, activity_description FROM user_activity_logs WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM user_activity_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(log_id) FROM user_activity_logs GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM user_activity_logs;
SELECT * FROM user_activity_logs WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT log_id, user_id, timestamp FROM user_activity_logs WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM user_activity_logs WHERE activity_description LIKE '%login%';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(log_id) AS num_logs FROM user_activity_logs GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM user_activity_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM UserHistory WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, action_description, action_time FROM UserHistory WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY action_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, action_description FROM UserHistory WHERE action_description LIKE '%login%';
SELECT log_id, user_id, log_time, log_description FROM ActivityLogs WHERE log_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_actions FROM UserHistory GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_actions DESC;
SELECT user_id, action_time, action_description FROM UserHistory WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY action_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM ActivityLogs WHERE log_description LIKE '%error%' ORDER BY log_time ASC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_actions FROM UserHistory GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_actions > 1 ORDER BY total_actions DESC;
SELECT user_id, MAX(action_time) AS latest_action FROM UserHistory GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT u.user_id, u.action_time, a.log_time FROM UserHistory u JOIN ActivityLogs a ON u.user_id = a.user_id WHERE u.user_id = 2 ORDER BY u.action_time ASC, a.log_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, activity_description, activity_date FROM activities WHERE activity_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, count(log_id) FROM logs GROUP BY user_id HAVING count(log_id) > 10;
SELECT user_id, log_message, log_timestamp FROM logs WHERE log_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-03-01 23:59:59';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%example%';
SELECT user_id, username, email, created_at FROM users WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM activities JOIN users ON activities.user_id = users.user_id;
SELECT log_id, log_message AS message, log_timestamp AS timestamp FROM logs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM virtual_assistants_users;
SELECT user_id, email, username FROM virtual_assistants_users WHERE username = 'alice';
SELECT user_id, action, log_time FROM user_activity_logs ORDER BY log_time DESC;
SELECT session_id, start_time, end_time FROM assistant_sessions WHERE user_id = 101 ORDER BY start_time ASC;
SELECT error_id, error_message, error_time FROM assistant_errors WHERE error_time >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM virtual_assistants_users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM virtual_assistants_users WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT session_id, start_time, end_time FROM assistant_sessions WHERE end_time IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM user_activity_logs WHERE log_time > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY log_time DESC;

SELECT assistant_errors.error_id, assistant_errors.error_message, assistant_sessions.session_id, assistant_sessions.start_time FROM assistant_errors JOIN assistant_sessions ON assistant_errors.session_id = assistant_sessions.session_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, date_joined FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM session_logs ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, action FROM user_history WHERE action LIKE '%login%';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY date_joined DESC;
SELECT user_id, action FROM assistant_activity WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_history WHERE action LIKE '%login%';
SELECT user_id, log_text FROM assistant_logs WHERE log_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
